```{r setup}
library(fastGFPCA)
library(tidyverse)
```


Simulate data that has periodic endpoints with 200 subjects and 100 timepoints

```{r}
# simulate data
dat_sim <- sim_gfpca(N = 200, J = 100, case = 1)

df_bfpca <- dat_sim$df_gxfpca
bin_len = 10
```
